title: Remaining Relative visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Subclass 115 Remaining Relative visa, a permanent visa for people whose only close family are in Australia. It outlines eligibility requirements, costs, application process, conditions, and obligations associated with the visa. The page also includes updates about ImmiAccount services starting from 23 July 2025.

structured_data.description: This permanent visa lets people move to Australia to be with their only close family members.

important_updates.exceptions: Some applications lodged outside Australia before 25 June 2020 cannot be imported into ImmiAccount.

benefits: Sponsor relatives to come to Australia
Attend free English classes through the Adult Migrant English Program (if eligible)
Travel to and from Australia for 5 years from visa grant

travel_conditions.initial_travel_validity: 5 years from date of visa grant
after_5_years: Apply for a Resident Return Visa (RRV) to re-enter as a permanent resident

eligibility.remaining_relative_requirement: Applicant must be a remaining relative of an Australian citizen, permanent resident, or eligible New Zealand citizen.

eligible_sponsors: Eligible partner of the applicant's relative

conditions: Applicant or partner must not have a near relative living outside Australia
Applicant or partner must not have a near relative living in Australia on a temporary visa (unless an eligible New Zealand citizen)
Near relatives living unlawfully in Australia also count

assurance_of_support.description: Ensures the applicant will not rely on government assistance after arriving in Australia.

citizenship_residency_rule: Permanent residency starts when the applicant enters Australia on this visa
If previously a permanent visa holder in Australia before last departure, permanent residency begins at time of visa grant

family_inclusion.when_they_can_be_added: Any time before the visa decision
requirements_for_family_members: Must meet health and character requirements
Non-migrating family members may also need to meet health and character requirements
family_inclusion.newborn_child: Guidance available on what to do if a child is born after applying

costs.additional_charges: Each additional family member incurs an extra charge

payment_structure.description: First instalment paid on application, second instalment paid when requested

tools.visa_pricing_estimator: Does not include second instalment or additional costs

application_process.decision_location_requirement: Must be outside Australia when the decision is made
application_process.help_with_visa_warning: Check who is legally allowed to assist before paying anyone

general_notes: Demand for Other Family visas exceeds available places
Processing time guide tool shows recent decisions only
processing_times.payment_requirement: Application cannot be processed without correct visa application charge

obligations.first_entry_date_requirement: Must enter Australia before the date specified in the grant letter (generally within 12 months of grant)
